description:
Prowlarr is an indexer manager/proxy built on the popular *arr .net/reactjs base stack to integrate with your various PVR apps.

Prowlarr supports management of both Torrent Trackers and Usenet Indexers.
It integrates seamlessly with Lidarr, Mylar3, Radarr, Readarr, and Sonarr offering complete management of your indexers with no per app Indexer setup required.
Changes:
- Use minor version for core-js in babel/preset-env
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Upgrade TypeScript and core-js
- Fixed: Error getting processes in some cases
- Bump version to 1.28.2
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Fixed: Refresh backup list on deletion [ #2300 ]
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Sync TimeSpanConverter with upstream
- Bump version to 1.28.1
- Fixed: (M-Team) IMDb removed from releases response
- Fixed: Syncing Newznab indexers with expired VIP expiration dates to apps
- Fixed: Link to TMDb shows in search history [ #2294 ]
- Automated API Docs update
- New: Add config file setting for CGNAT authentication bypass
- Allow GetFileSize to follow symlinks
- Bump IPAddressRange, Npgsql and Polly
- Fixed: Prevent lack of internet from stopping all health checks from running
- Support Postgres with non-standard version string
- Remove unnecessary heap allocations in local IP check
- Webpack web target
- Bump version to 1.28.0
